title: Comfort Colors Adult Short Sleeve Pocket Tee, Style 6030
description: double-needle stitched sleeves and bottom hem

The Comfort Colors G6030 Adult Heavyweight short sleeve pocket tee gives you ultimate softness, laid-back ease and a vintage vibe that’s been 40 years in the making. It’s crafted with 100% ring spun cotton, garment-dyed for an authentic worn-in look. Take your pick of nature-inspired colors – and experience how a tee shirt is supposed to feel.
